acceptOwnership().details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a pending owner Can only be called by the pending owner.

calculateCompoundInterestRate((int256,in.details: pure function that calculates interest rate based on raw input data

params._interestRateTimestamp: timestamp of last interest rate update

returns.Tcrit: time during which the utilization exceeds the critical value
returns.rcomp: compounded interest rate from last update until now
returns.ri: current integral part of the rate

calculateCurrentInterestRate((int256,int.details: pure function that calculates current annual interest rate

params._interestRateTimestamp: timestamp of last interest rate update

params._asset: address of an asset in Silo for which interest rate should be calculated

returns.rcomp: compounded interest rate from last update until now

getCompoundInterestRateAndUpdate(address.details: get compound interest rate and update model storage

params._asset: address of an asset in Silo for which interest rate should be calculated

returns.rcomp: compounded interest rate from last update until now

params._asset: address of an asset in Silo for which interest rate should be calculated

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferPendingOwnership(address).details: Transfers pending ownership of the contract to a new account (`newPendingOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

DP.details: DP is 18 decimal points used for integer calculations

RCOMP_MAX.details: maximum value of compound interest teh model will return

X_MAX.details: maximum value of X for which, RCOMP_MAX should be returned
